values:
Today my Mom and stepfather went to San Antonio and I stayed here at my step aunt's house and she has a computer with really fast internet! LOL! Well I've been talking to alot of girls on line most are bi so we had a little.....chat....LOL! Well see ya!

                                  Sayonara!


5 days till I go to San Antonio!

Today...I had to wake up at 10 to go to my doctor's appointment...Sadly, The doc wasn't there...=.= I woke up for nothing! Anyway, I watched Viva La Bam all day until they put the new episode of MADE! But it was boring....it was about a kid that wanted to be a rapper....what a waste. Well my mom tells me that I have to stay at my step-aunts house cuz she's leaving out of town....but I don't mind cuz my step-aunt is 17 and we're like sisters. Plus she has a computer! Ha Ha Ha!

                                 Sayonara!


6 days till I go to San Antonio!

Today I didn't do nothing again....but then My new Maxi Glide came in the package today!
Oh and if you don't know what that is....its a new hair straighter thingy that is awsome! I straithened my hair! It rocks!

                             Sayonara!


7 days till I go to San Antonio!

Today wasn't really fun...I just stayed home and watched TV....That's all....Boring!

                                      Sayonara!

8 days till I go to San Antonio!

The movies that I saw today was awsome! I watched "Bewitched" and "Herbie:fully loaded" It was so cute! ^.^ My favorite part in "Bewitched" was when Will Ferell said, "Where out thou dog!" and "You shall lick my face and I shall lick your snout!" <---I think that's how it goes....Anyway it was hilarious! I liked "Herbie: Fully Loaded" because Herbie looked so cute beating everyone in the race track! LOL! Well, My best friend in the world couldn't come with me cuz she had Church today....10:00 AM to 4:00 PM! It's cuz she goes to like 3 different churches! But hey, I don't blame her....She just loves God, and I respect that. Well I saw Inuyasha yesterday! Turns out they moved the time to 11:00 PM instead of 10:00 PM. I loved it when Shippo cried in the top of his lungs when he told Inuyasha that Kagome,Miroku,Sango stopped breathing. It ....*snif* was so touching....*wipes tear* Well I gues that's all that happend today...Oh "La Academia" is on right now! I wonder whwo's gonna leave this time! I'm pretty sure it's gonna be Silvia....or Adrian...but I'm pretty sure it's Silvia....Well I gotta go! My step uncle is bragging to get off of the computer cuz he likes to talk to girls online! LOL! HOW PATHETIC! NO OFFENSE JR! LOL! 
                                              Sayonara!

9 days till I go to San Antonio!

I don't really mind that I cut my really long hair to a very short cut!! But my mom is complaining and worrying how is she going to fix my hair for my 15! >< Ugh! I don't know what to do!.....Oh well. The reason I cut my hair is because I want a new look for high school (freshman) and also because I hate it that I allways have knots in my long hair....so I cut it....Right now I'm in some kind of Princess house demonstration. I don't care much for crystal plates....Well I'm gonna leave now! 

                              Sayonara!
                                    Kagome

10 days till I go to San Antonio
